OOC: I saw X-Men, and I must say it could have been better.

~~~~~~~`

::: Hell Beast tries to recall what happened, and why he would have sex with 
Demona. He couldnt remember what had happened in the last 24 hours. Of 
course, thats nothing he would reveal to his crew who might think the old 
Predacon was getting too old. :::

::: Gremlin ::: Commander, are you sure?

::: Hell Beast snapped ::: Sure of what?

::: Gremlin ::: Of attacking the Cybertronian fire.

::: Hell Beast :::: When did I issue that order?

::: Gremlin ::: Yesterday, sir. Sir, are you feeling alright?

::: Hell Beast ::: Im feeling fine. Where is Demona....and Black Aracnia?!

::: Pheniox, from her computer station, ::: Demona isnt feeling well and 
Black Aracnia is administering her.

::: Hell Beast taps a comm unit, ::: Fembots, get to the bridge now.

::: A few moments past and they arrived, Demona making herself look rather 
ill. :::

::: Black Aracnia ::: You rang?

::: Hell Beast ::: i dont know what you two are planning, but I will find out 
and send you both to the scrap heap!

::: They stared at him in silence before he sent them away. :::

::: After they left, Gremlin once agian turned to his Commander, ::: Are we 
to attack? The Newcomers attacked and I think we could finish it off.

:::: Hell Beast let the thought run around in his head a moment and 
replied, ::: Very well. Send out a message to our Predacons to gather 
together and arm themselfs. And I will contact Megatron...and Magmatron and 
see if they will help us. Gaining the Cybertronina Fire would be a great 
victory.

::: He once agian taps his comm unit, and sends the message to Magmatron and 
Megatron to help in the battle agianst the Maximal 
base. :::

~~~~~~~~~~

::: Demona laughs as she thinks how she manipulated Hell Beast. Her 
telepathic abilities were getting stronger, and now that she was pregnant 
with the heir to the Predacon throne....things were going to get interesting. 
All she needed now was a stasis pod to transfer the phetus data into the 
protoform. Then, after a two week gestation period her baby boy would be 
formed. 
    Black Aracnia had made her as comfortable as possible in her state. And 
would go out later and scout a pod. :::
